name: City in Amber
description:
City in Amber

This project was made in Fall 2021 at University of Southern California with fellow MFA games students. This project was to tell a meaningful story, ours being a man who has to overcome his prejudices to recognize that some species share similarities with his and can be just as intelligent and knowledgeable as him. 

Instructors: Sean Bloom and Peter Brinson 

Brendan Hutchins - Programmer 

Hannah Saftler - Artist 

Haoyun Zhang - Producer, Writer
